hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
cd /html/eol_php_code/update_resources/connectors
### main operation php5.6 wikimedia_subsets.php jenkins
# === STEP: fill-up missing parent entries php5.6 fill_up_undefined_parents.php jenkins '{"resource_id": "wikimedia_comnames", "source_dwca": "wikimedia_comnames", "resource": "fillup_missing_parents"}'
### NEW:start - To free up space, delete un-needed files. Part of housekeeping. cd /extra/dumps/wikidata [ -f latest-all.json.gz ] && rm -f latest-all.json.gz || echo "File does not exist" [ -f latest-all.json ] && rm -f latest-all.json || echo "File does not exist"
##CANNOT DELETE AT THIS POINT, FILE WILL BE USED IN WIKIPEDIA EN AND MAYBE OTHER LANGS. ##gzip -c latest-all-taxon.json > latest-all-taxon.json.gz ##rm -f latest-all-taxon.json
cd /extra/dumps/wikidata/wikimedia [ -f commonswiki-latest-pages-articles.xml ] && rm -f commonswiki-latest-pages-articles.xml || echo "File does not exist" [ -f commonswiki-latest-pages-articles.xml.bz2 ] && rm -f commonswiki-latest-pages-articles.xml.bz2 || echo "File does not exist" ### NEW:end
### temporarily will not proceed to 'Post-build Actions' #exit 1
### orig post-build actions: ### 08.5.1 Hash media identifiers 71
